messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: Concerning MP expenses, Affordable housing, Cancer task, Local MP Surgeries, Hunting with dogs

messages.title: Safe with Labour
messages.content: Labour supports parents (and grandparents!), Labour listens to working people., The NHS is safe with Labour

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will not claim for a second home on the taxpayer, only essential expenses.
Will always fight to allow local authorities to build more homes for rent.
Will work hard to ensure that NHS trusts adhere to the one-week limit for cancer testing.
Will hold surgeries in the main towns and villages.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The choice for your future is between Labour and Conservative.

issues.education: Better maternity leave and paternity leave with more Sure Starts opening and free entitlement to nursery places for every three and four year old.
issues.health: The NHS is safe with Labour. Labour has funded 89,000 extra nurses and 44,000 extra doctors since 1997. Waiting times have been reduced and will be reducing further. New hospitals, including the Lymington.

housing.content: Will always fight to allow Local authorities to build more homes for rent.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in the constituency since 1976. To find out more about who I am and what I stand for, please visit our website.

contactInformation.address: 159 Heather Road, Fawley, Southampton, Hampshire, SO45 1EW

endorsements.endorsement: I was the Labour candidate in 1997 and 2001 to give this constituency a voice in Parliament. Peter has the same values as I have, I urge everyone to give him the majority he needs to be your voice in Parliament.

images.caption: Peter Sopowski with a senior member of the Labour party
